vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: LastMsg in Log.AddMessage (patch_18.sol#48) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.Deposit (patch_18.sol#17-23):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_18.sol#20)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_18.sol#21)

external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_18.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_18.sol#1): it allows old versions
